slide.title: Adding a review

div.example:
<?php
$whisky = new (\MongoDB\Client)->demo->whisky;

$newReview = [
    user_name => "Michael",
    date => new \MongoDB\BSON\UTCDateTime( new DateTimeImmutable("2017-02-02") ),
    note => "No peat, but fruity",
    rating => 1,
];

$whisky->updateOne(
    [ 'name' => 'Glenfiddich 15' ],
    [ '$push => [ 'notes' => $newReview ] ]
);
?>
